headline: Kevin O'Leary Says 'The Demand Is Off The Charts' For Data Centers. It's Where 'Real Estate Meets Tech In The Most Lucrative Way'
summary: Kevin O’Leary has recently noted the increasing demand for data centers, describing them as a notable combination of real estate and technology with considerable potential. “The demand is off the charts,” O’Leary said in a video about the future of AI and tech infrastructure. “If I were 25 today, I'd focus on two massive opportunities: AI implementation and data center development.” If I were 25 today, I'd focus on two massive opportunities: AI implementation and data center development.
